bib_record.title: Transfer reactions in inverse kinematics- An experimental approach for fission investigations.

free_txt: *By authors*.Cross sections and angular and excitation
energy distributions were measured for the inelastic
and transfer channels. Possible excitations of the
targetlike nuclei were experimentally investigated for
the first time, by means of gamma-ray measurements.
